name: Under The Mask (itch)
description:
You're Stuck in a Dungeon. The Air is Poisoned  and you are losing health every second. Make sure you see 'Under the Mask' before shooting as some Enemies will dress like you. TRUST NO ONE!

Controls : 

WASD & Mouse.

Press N to go to the next tutorial

Press R to restart level.

Recommended : Downloaded Version. (Felt a bit laggy in the browser)

Credits:

Tileset : https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii & https://szadiart.itch.io/rogue-fantasy-castle
